title: Biscuits (For the Williamsburg Chicken & Biscuits Recipe)
instructions: Sift the dry ingredients and cut in the shortening with a pastry blender.  Moisten with milk
Roll out ¾ inch thick on a lightly floured board; cut with a 2-inch biscuit cutter.  Place on top of the chicken mixture.
source: The Williamsburg Cookbook, Updated 1975 Edition, Published by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation, Williamsburg, Virginia.
